paragraph.value: We report the performance in probing tasks in Table 2. In general, DCT yields

in c[0 : K], While increasing K has no positive effect on surface information tasks, syntactic and semantic tasks demonstrate performance gains with larger K. This trend is clearly observed in all syntactic tasks and three of the semantic tasks, where DCT performs well above AVG and the performance improves with increasing K. , although all DCT results are still higher than AVG.
